text.text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information that we have collected. If you would like to exercise any of these rights or have any questions about how we handle your personal information, please contact our Privacy Officer at privacy@hplcompany.com.

If you prefer not to have your information collected or used for marketing purposes, you may opt out by contacting our Privacy Officer or by disabling cookies and tracking in your web browser settings. Please note that opting out may affect your experience of using our website in ways we can not predict.

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy on our website.
If you have any questions about this policy or any of our privacy practices, contact our privacy officer at privacy@hplcompany.com. This privacy policy was last updated on 7 February 2024.
